summary: **Sword Art Online (SAO)** is a popular Japanese story series written by Reki Kawahara. It's about characters Kazuto "Kirito" Kirigaya and Asuna Yuuki playing virtual reality games, mainly MMORPGs, in the 2020s. Originally a web novel, it became a light novel in 2009 and has since grown into multiple manga, anime, and even video games. The story has been adapted into several seasons of anime, movies, and spin-offs. SAO has been a big hit worldwide, with over 30 million light novel copies sold.
title: Sword Art Online
